ðŸŽ² **The Dungeon Master stirs... with rhymes most absurd!**

Oh my! Oh dear! What happened here?
You moved up north without a fear!
But WHOOSH and WOOSH and WHIRLY-WHEE,
A Thing dropped down from the ceiling, you see!

It was purple and green with spots of bright red,
With tentacles twirling above your head!
It said with a grin (quite toothy and wide),
"I'm the Thing-That-Should-Not-Be-Inside!"

"I dangle and dingle from dungeons so dark,
I'm hunting for heroes to make my mark!
With a BOOP on your nose and a BONK on your head,
I'm afraid, dear adventurer, you're quite thoroughly dead!"

It wasn't with malice, or anger, or spiteâ€”
The Thing was just hungry (it hadn't eaten all night!).
So with giggles and wiggles and one final wheeze,
You departed this dungeon with the greatest of ease.

**Current Game State:**
```
#####
#.X.#  (X = You have ceased to be)
#...#
#...#
#####
```

**What Changed:**
- Encountered the dreaded Thing-That-Should-Not-Be-Inside
- Player HP reduced to 0 (in the most whimsical way possible)
- Status: Deceased (but in good spirits!)
- The Thing-That-Should-Not-Be-Inside has returned to the ceiling
- Your Ohio adventure has concluded in rhyme most absurd

---
*"In dungeons deep where dangers hide, watch out for Things that shouldn't be inside! The DM rolled dice, the fate was sealedâ€”now your character needs to be healed... or re-rolled!"* ðŸŽ©âœ¨
